App.title: Privacy, Security and everything in between

Landing.description: News, guides and reviews on technology, how to use it and how to ensure your data remains is protected online.
Landing.tagline: Xanzhu is a platform for sharing knowledge. Help set the standard for the next generation of privacy and accessibility. Teaches how to use technology and stay safe online.

meta.title: Latest news, guides, and technology updates
meta.description: Latest tech news and advice. From emerging technologies to established companies, learn how to stay ahead in tech while protecting your security and privacy.

Blog.title: Nga Korero Hou
Blog.description: Tūmataitinga, Haumarutanga me nga mea katoa i waenga.

meta.title: Nga Panui Blog Hou
meta.description: Kei a Xanzhu nga korero mo nga hangarau hou. Te arotahi ki te ahuru me te ahuru o nga kaiwhakamahi

Privacy-Policy.title: Kaupapahere Tūmataiti
Privacy-Policy.description: Arotakehia ta matou tauākī kaupapa here tūmataiti
Privacy-Policy.section-one: He mea nui ki a maatau muna me te whakaute ki te hunga e toro mai ana ki ta maatau paetukutuku. Kaore he korero tautuhi e penapena, e uru atu ana ranei ki te kore a koe e whakaaetia kia mohio kei poka ke to noho muna.
Privacy-Policy.section-two: Na te mea kei roto i to maatau papaanga nga hononga ki nga paetukutuku tuatoru, kaore e taea e matou te aukati i te whai i waho o to maatau paetukutuku.
Privacy-Policy.section-three: Raraunga whakamahi e whakaratohia ana e to kaitirotiro (User-Agent), kei roto nga wahitau IP, nga kaitirotiro me nga taputapu e whakamahia ana. Ka whakamahia enei raraunga mo nga inenga me nga korero a te tūmau.

a11y.new-window: Ka tuwhera te hono ki te matapihi hou, ripa ranei

Maintenance.title: Tiakitanga Paetukutuku
Maintenance.section-one: Ka whakahou tonu tenei whaarangi ka pai ake te hoahoa.
Maintenance.section-two: Ko te tumanako ka tukuna ta maatau paetukutuku i te mutunga o te tau.

Error.title: He raru
Error.description: Kua raru tetahi mea o to tono
